name: The Monster PIMP
description:
[Story]
He wasn't very popular with the ladies...
But he had a special power...
He can see monsters that
others can't!
With supernatural events happening around town,
he decides to use his abilities to find the monsters in hiding...!
[Game system]
Taking out the Evil Spirits
Take out the 60+ Evil Spirits lurking around the world!
Fight them using an orthodox turn-based fighting system.
Monsters
- Nekomata
- Ittan-momen
- Water Imp
and many more!
Try to find them all!
Use special items at certain fights to unlock hidden events...!
